name: Rocket Bow
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 39

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

You are


Avoid

Collect

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Controlls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

LMB -  Charge/Fire Bow

Hold down left mouse button to charge bow, release to fire.

You lose 1% of your power every second.

If you touch an enemy you'll lose 10%, if you touch a ghost you'll gain 10%.
